item.title: Funzone/safezone error!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Trust me, look then.

We will see how many Opening brackets there are. and how many closing Brackets there are.

public boolean funZone() [b]{ +1 Open[/b] if((absX >=2902 && absX <=2923 && absY >=3598 && absY <=3626) || heightLevel == 0) return true; else return false; [b]}+1 Close[/b] [b]}+1 Close[/b]

1 Open
2 Closed?

As for mine.

public boolean funZone() [b]{ +1 Open[/b] if((absX >=2902 && absX <=2923 && absY >=3598 && absY <=3626) || heightLevel == 0) return true; else return false; [b]}+1 Close[/b]

1 Open
1 Closed.

Thats better.

Read full topic

item.title: Funzone/safezone error!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

as you see


	public boolean funZone() {
	if((absX >=2902 && absX <=2923 && absY >=3598 && absY <=3626) || heightLevel == 0)
	    return true;
	else
	   return false;
	}
    }

Should be:


	public boolean funZone() {
	if((absX >=2902 && absX <=2923 && absY >=3598 && absY <=3626) || heightLevel == 0)
	    return true;
	else
	   return false;
	}

Read full topic

i typed ;

[code] }

public boolean cannonowner() {
    if (playerName == cannonowner) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

public boolean funZone() {
if((absX >=2902 && absX <=2923 && absY >=3598 && absY <=3626) || heightLevel == 0)
    return true;
else
   return false;
}
}

public boolean hasAxe() {
    if (playerHasItem2(6739) || playerHasItem2(1351) || playerHasItem2(1349)
            || playerHasItem2(1353) || playerHasItem2(1355)
            || playerHasItem2(1357) || playerHasItem2(1359)
            || playerHasItem2(1361)) {
        return true;
    }
